description:
Elegantly constructed with durable, eco-friendly materials, this carry-on is replete with easy-to-access compartments and organizing features that will satisfy the most detail-oriented traveller. Once you're off the plane, it slips over the handles on your rolling luggage with a slick pass-through sleeve.

  • EcoSystem™ body fabric and liner are made from post-consumer water bottles
  • Adjustable padded shoulder straps offer a comfortable carry
  • Main compartment has a zippered mesh storage sleeve
  • Front compartment with organizers and key clip
  • Padded, fleece lined sleeve fits a 16” laptop
  • Hidden shoulder stash pocket for wireless earbuds
  • Dual side stretch mesh pockets for a water bottle or umbrella
  • Trolley pass-through sleeve allows the pack to ride on the telescoping handle of your rolling luggage
name: Herschel Kaslo Tech 20 Daypack - Unisex
